titleStmt.title: A funeral sermon preached at the obsequies of the right reverend father in God, Jeremy, Lord Bishop of Down who deceased at Lysburne August 13th, 1667 / by Dr. George Rust.
titleStmt.author: Rust, George, d. 1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Tyler for Richard Royston,

notesStmt.note: Item at 804:1e is the fifth title in: Eniautos / Jeremy Taylor. London, 1668 ( Wing T331).
